entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tatlayoko Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tatlayoko Lake 02:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with wet snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. A few flurries near the Coastal mountains overnight. Amount 2 cm near the Coastal mountains. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
